cards.flavor_text: [i]Daddy here abandoned my mother and I, left us for dead so he could cook up demonic weapons for the Order. My good looks are about all I got from him.[/i]

Nero

cards.rules_text:
Gain a Stylish Rank. 
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor_text: [i]A demon made out of sacks filled with Trypoxylus. The bugs are unintelligent on their own, but moving as one, they animate a demon that's... also unintelligent.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Until end of turn, players can't sacrifice permanents and creatures can't die or be exiled.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I couldn't protect Credo. To this day, I hate myself for not having enough strength. But this time is different. I swear!”[/i]
